Package org.svvrl.goal.core.repo

Class Repository

java.lang.Object
org.svvrl.goal.core.repo.Repository
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.swing.ListModel<Entry>
public class Repository
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.swing.ListModel<Entry>
This class defines a list model which can be used in a JList for further repository manipulation. There are also several static methods that can be used to manipulate the repository.
Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai

    • openAsAutomaton

      public static Automaton openAsAutomaton​(Entry entry)
      Opens the GFF file in a specified entry as an automaton object.
      Parameters:
      entry - an entry to be opened
      Returns:
      the automaton decoded from the GFF file in entry, or null if the GFF file in the entry cannot be opened or decoded
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the decoded object is not an automaton

    • createUserRepository

      public static void createUserRepository() throws java.io.IOException
      Creates the directory of the user-defined repository.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if the directory cannot be created

    • addUserEntry

      public static void addUserEntry​(LocalEntry entry, java.io.File source)
      Inserts a user-defined entry to the index file and also copies the GFF file source to the folder of the user repository.
      Parameters:
      entry - a user-defined entry to be inserted
      source - the source GFF file to be inserted

    • removeUserEntry
